entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse LIVE: Press Briefing for damage control to assure Americans drinking bleach like the dumbass @realDonaldTrump isn't going to cure Coronavirus.

Hey Trump supporters, how do you feel about your chooch in chief now? Reeeeeal smart guy, he's got the good, you know, *points to head*
